---
title: 分页问题
description: paging
date: 2024-12-26
weight: 20000


---
<style>
th, td {
  border: 1px solid rgb(190, 190, 190);
}
</style>


{{<alert color="secondary">}}



{{</alert>}}

## 问题

```sql
select * from table_name order by id limit m, n;
```

该语句的意思就是查询m+n条记录，去掉前m条，返回后n条。无疑该查询能够实现分页，但m越大，查询性能就越低，因为MySQL需要扫描全部m+n条记录。

## 一、准备


```sql
[dbscale_internal@172.17.136.101:16310 15:54:11(db4)]$ show create table sbtest1\G
*************************** 1. row ***************************
       Table: sbtest1
Create Table: CREATE TABLE `sbtest1` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `k` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `c` char(120) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `pad` char(60) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `sex` int DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `k_1` (`k`),
  KEY `idx_sex` (`sex`),
  KEY `idx_pad` (`pad`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5000001 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
1 row in set (0.03 sec)

[dbscale_internal@172.17.136.101:16310 15:54:21(db4)]$ select count(*) from sbtest1;
+----------+
| count(*) |
+----------+
|  5000000 |
+----------+
1 row in set (0.44 sec)


```




## 二、实现

全表扫描性能弱于全索引扫描


```sql
[dbscale_internal@172.17.136.101:16310 16:02:54(db4)]$ select * from sbtest1 order by k,id limit 100,10;
```

### 排序字段最大值子查询


### join分页


```sql
[dbscale_internal@172.17.136.101:16310 15:50:38(db4)]$ select * from sbtest1 as a inner join (select k,id from sbtest1 order by k limit 100000, 10) as b on a.k = b.k and a.id=b.id order by a.k;
+---------+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+------+-------+---------+
| id      | k     | c                                                                                                                       | pad                                                         | sex  | k     | id      |
+---------+-------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------+------+-------+---------+
|   62370 | 62758 | 35551245872-59067402850-85390224523-90141477631-51556489119-75757998551-64489207945-02826331878-65732787112-65281587974 | 97354515097-52679296964-82495956650-73240114697-79744484581 |    0 | 62758 |   62370 |
|  982177 | 62759 | 07245629263-70286458519-64534382030-27740129357-07618968020-14532230040-45409505641-54709229574-84141846036-58943400051 | 79569004916-81209104539-29766958439-60050093483-51634425442 |    2 | 62759 |  982177 |
| 1458845 | 62760 | 54482316699-12253661291-36776633678-48430450906-77700225079-13007870033-30188851066-87622223393-57170070440-01342514090 | 86339671074-74018381487-37610761848-22712862703-87527149933 |    2 | 62760 | 1458845 |
| 2799744 | 62760 | 55233055092-90822666194-38398235435-96787647257-93253304783-51231346838-42255338784-10544431173-98117870071-16363084838 | 93176745276-63217314950-63492461230-42287438210-77569160653 |    0 | 62760 | 2799744 |
|   27930 | 62761 | 56416904200-79450448662-80508772965-69940040042-73059867283-97311328680-38327719379-17748727044-61900381472-06725902258 | 67637440951-25219452513-89218600179-63469939056-07555546808 |    0 | 62761 |   27930 |
```
